io.hekate.codec

Interface CodecService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service

    public interface CodecService
extends Service
    « start hereMain entry point to data serialization API.

    Overview

    CodecService represents the Service interface adaptor for CodecFactory in order to make it easily accessible via Hekate.get(Class) method. All data encoding/decoding operations are delegated to the CodecFactory instance that is registered via HekateBootstrap.setDefaultCodec(CodecFactory) method.

    Accessing service

    Instances of this service can be obtained via Hekate.codec() method as shown in the example below: 

    
CodecService codecService = hekate.codec();

    See Also:
    Codec, HekateBootstrap.setDefaultCodec(CodecFactory)
